Portfolio

Third Year in IT school, Cybersecurity.

I chose the international language for my website in a way to have more possibilities with companies. I'm a French person, fluent in English.

But if you click on the buttons in the navigation you can switch language between French and English, don't worry you have the choice!

You can now explore my portfolio, you can find my skills and my projects. If you click on my various links, you will be directed directly to my GIT in order to have all the detailed information.
